name: Resolve (robbossmango89)
description:
A simple tower defense game I made using free assets while learning game development.

Movement: SPACE key to jump, A key to move left, D key to move right
Attack: LEFT CLICK to normal attack, RIGHT click to special attack.
Special attack: gain resolve points with normal attack, unleash special attack once you obtain 50 resolve points.
Others; ESC key to pause game

Source code: https://github.com/nhn190000/Resolve
